subclusters.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction and Nutrient Signaling Aging Theory
Reproduction-Fat Metabolism and Hormonal Signaling Aging Theory

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DAF-16/FOXO Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on DAF-16 as a master regulator downstream of IIS pathway controlling longevity, immunity, and stress resistance.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DAF-16/FOXO Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes conserved IIS pathway and lifespan extension via reduced insulin/IGF-1 signaling involving daf-2 and daf-16.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DAF-16/FOXO Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Details IIS pathway regulation of aging via circRNA and DAF-16/dFoxo-dependent mechanisms.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DAF-16/FOXO Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explains lifespan extension by naringin through IIS pathway modulation and DAF-16 activation.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DAF-16/FOXO Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Shows IIS reduction extends lifespan via proteostasis reactivation and DAF-16 related pathways.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DAF-16/FOXO Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on conserved IIS pathway components including DAF-16/FOXO regulating lifespan and metabolism.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DAF-16/FOXO Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Myricetin extends lifespan by activating DAF-16 downstream of IIS pathway.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DAF-16/FOXO Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes IIS pathway mutations affecting lifespan and healthspan via DAF-16/FOXO.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DAF-16/FOXO Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Reduced IIS activity extends lifespan through tissue-specific gene expression changes involving DAF-16.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DAF-16/FOXO Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Combines ROS scavenging with IIS pathway and DAF-16 activation for lifespan extension.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DAF-16/FOXO Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Reduced IGF-I signaling extends lifespan via oxidative stress resistance and DAF-16 related pathways.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Insulin/IGF-1 Antagonistic Pleiotropy and mTOR Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Focuses on antagonistic pleiotropy of IIS promoting growth early but aging later via mTOR and immunosuppression.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction and Nutrient Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes lifespan extension by dietary restriction through nutrient availability and physiological state changes.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction and Nutrient Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Explains DR effects via metabolic shift, nutrient sensing (mTOR, IIS, sirtuins), and autophagy.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction and Nutrient Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Links DR and TOR signaling in lifespan extension, highlighting royal jelly component 10-HDA effects.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction and Nutrient Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Energy restriction extends lifespan by hormesis, antioxidant defense, and metabolic adaptations.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction and Nutrient Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Caloric restriction extends lifespan and reduces age-related diseases via multiple mechanisms including insulin signaling.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction and Nutrient Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: CR extends lifespan by inhibiting nutrient sensing pathways (IIS, mTOR), activating sirtuins and stress responses.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction and Nutrient Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: CR delays aging by metabolic and antioxidative mechanisms and CR mimetics activating sirtuins.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Dietary Restriction and Nutrient Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Nutritional memory limits late-onset DR benefits by impairing adipose tissue metabolic reprogramming.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: DAF-16/FOXO Insulin/IGF-1 Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: DAF-16 activation via JNK and AMPK pathways under dietary restriction mediates lifespan extension.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Fat Metabolism and Hormonal Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Describes trade-offs between reproduction and somatic maintenance mediated by fat metabolism and hormonal signaling.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Reproduction-Fat Metabolism and Hormonal Signaling Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Trade-off theory of senescence shaped by balance between maintenance and reproduction costs.

theory_assignments.subcluster_name: Molecular Mobility and Biophysical Aging Theory
theory_assignments.reasoning: Molecular mobility in cytoplasm controls aging rates in dry germplasm via glassy state and reaction kinetics.
